snippet: It's not much of an amusement park attraction, but Ford still makes riders sign a release before hopping aboard its cloud-computing demonstration ride.
abstract: It's not much of an amusement park attraction, but Ford still makes riders sign a release before hopping aboard its cloud-computing demonstration ride.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT -- Notwithstanding its recent problems with the Ford MyTouch telematics system, Ford has been keen to trumpet its leading position with respect to in-car technology.

headline.main: Up, Up and Away Into Ford's Cloud
